author: cnbc.com
title: CORRECTION: Builders Capital Mortgage Corp. Announces Class B Non-voting Share Distribution
text:
CALGARY, Alberta, April 24, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- This document corrects and replaces the press release that was sent today at 3:23 PM EST and 4:05 PM EST. The error occurred in the first paragraph where it should have read "The distribution will be paid on April 30, 2018 to holders of Class B Non-Voting shares of record on April 30, 2018." The corrected release appears below.
Builders Capital Mortgage Corp. (the “ Company ”) (TSXV:BCF) announced today that its board of directors has declared a distribution of $0.1763 per Class B Non-Voting share of the Company. The distribution will be paid on April 30, 2018 to holders of Class B Non-Voting shares of record on April 30, 2018.
For further information, please contact:
John Strangway, Chief Financial Officer
Telephone: (403) 685-9888
Builders Capital Mortgage Corp.
Suite 405, 1210 – 8th Street SW
Calgary, Alberta T2R 1L3
Neither TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined in policies of the TSX Venture Exchange) accepts responsibility for the adequacy or accuracy of this release.
Source:Builders Capital Mortgage Corp.
